Package edu.harvard.iq.dvn.core.web.customComponent.scroller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ScrollerComponent
    This component produces a search engine style scroller that facilitates easy navigation over results that span across several pages.
    ScrollerTag
    ScrollerTag is the tag handler class for ScrollerComponent.
